title: Naruto - Underwater (Doujinshi)
description:
Pairing: Kakashi x Hayate 

Gekkou Hayate’s previous mission was so dangerous that casualty was unavoidable, which lead to his poor teammate, Matsuba, sustaining severe injuries in his stead. Not the type who shows his emotion on his sleeves, his peers mistook his reserve that he’s just brushing away emotions, that he doesn’t care about the incident when the truth was just not so. Maybe, just maybe, someone out there will save him from spirally into the pit of despair…
